attributes.review: When I first opened the app it took my to a website that is totally inappropriate! I don’t even wanna write what the website was about because of how horrible it was!!! 😡 I don’t recommend this app to ANYONE. In total this app is just so horrible!😡🤢🤮
attributes.title: Worst app EVER!!!!

attributes.review: Me and my wife Karen were so disappointed by this app,very uncomfortable and very unprofessional. I’m deeply disappointed by it, I want a refund to rewind time and take those horrific images out of my mind. I will now be seeing a therapist next week.
attributes.title: One of the worst apps ever

attributes.review: This app was absolutely disgusting. My daughter was scrolling through it on my phone when a PORNHUB ad came up. It scarred my daughter for life! I cant believe after all this time and effort I put into supporting Trump, THIS happens?? Trump should not be supporting PORNHUB like this. Absolutely disgusting.😡
attributes.title: Trash trash trash!

attributes.review: I open the app, and see a big pig standing in the screen🐷 I screamed so loud my mom almost beat a**😰 thanks to that picture I almost got killed😭, not to mention almost broke my phone for the scare thank you very much😤😡... I need to wash my eyes out with bleache😭😭
attributes.title: The fat pig 🐖

attributes.review: This app is disgusting, it stole my dog, made me poor, when I opened it, it almost gave me a heart attack because I saw this orange thing, truly terrifying really, and it also stole my grandmas knees. So I would say 0/10 recommend, this app is truly horrifying.
attributes.title: 0/10 recommend 👁👄👁🤢

attributes.review: I tried to download the app but I’m black and trump only allows racist people to download and use the app. 🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀After I downloaded the app the FBI broke my window and shot my pet fish! I tried looking through the app and all I found was n*des of Donald Trump and photos of Donald trump touching young women🤢🤢🤢🐀🐀🐀🐀
attributes.title: TERRIBLE RACIST APP👁👅👁🤬🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: I thought this app would mimic Kim’s iconic game where you get to rise to fame, date celebrities, and become a model. But NO. Unfortunately I was unable to understand what it’s like to be Donald Trump and cheat your way to presidency. Very unfortunate and I’m deeply disappointed. 0 stars.
attributes.title: does NOT compare to the KKW Game

attributes.review: I fact check pretty much everything I read and this app doesn’t have real facts. Very bias and onside with the info it gives. Overall this app is very untrustworthy go read real facts and not Fox News.
attributes.title: Fact check

attributes.review: Yesterday my phone was working fine, this morning i downloaded the app, as soon as i opened it, the app crashed. God, this kept happening, and then my phone started to glitch. i just deleted the app.
attributes.title: wow, the glitches

attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app. I wanted to be up to date on the campaign but the app was very hard to navigate. Now I’m no tech savvy person or anything like that but it was harder than I expected. I do not recommend just use Fox News.
attributes.title: Sarah
